item.title: Bay area stroll -- A guide to explore peninsula
Interference: A common pitfall in randomization
item.description: A/B testing is a standard method of measuring the effect of changes by randomly assigning testing units to different groups. Randomization is key to A/B testing because it minimizes the chances that other factors will affect your result on average. A typical practice in A/B testing is to treat users as testing units, i.e. randomly assign users to control group (A) to treatment group (B) and perform hypothesis testing between

item.title: How does early stopping affect A/B experiment?
item.description: In the tech industry, we use controlled experiments to learn and make decisions at every step of product development, from design to algorithms. When the experiment is about a single change, such as changing the layout of the UI or using a different machine learning algorithm, the methodology is often called A/B testing. While is all fashionable and new to use A/B testing, the technique behind the scene, hypothesis testing,

item.title: The Element of Style
item.description: Elementary Rules Of Usage 1. Form the possessive singular of nouns by add â€˜s. 2. In a series of three or more terms with a single conjunction, use a comma after each term except the last. 3. Enclose parenthetic expressions between commas. 4. Place a comma before conjunction introducing an independent clause. 5. Do not join independent clauses with a comma. 6. Do not break sentences in two.
